actions.command: execute as @a if score @s omni_uuid1 = @e[tag=omni_body,limit=1,distance=..1] omni_uuid1 if score @s omni_uuid2 = @e[tag=omni_body,limit=1,distance=..1] omni_uuid2 if score @s omni_uuid3 = @e[tag=omni_body,limit=1,distance=..1] omni_uuid3 if score @s omni_uuid4 = @e[tag=omni_body,limit=1,distance=..1] omni_uuid4 run execute at @s run power revoke @e[distance=..10,tag=!omni_body,tag=!omni_body_offline] omni:dream_possessed
